amendment.description: To ensure appropriate funding for the Manufacturing Extension Partnership Program of the Department of Commerce.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3055 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3055 proposed by Senator Stabenow. (consideration: CR S2100-2101; text: CR S2100) To ensure appropriate funding for the Manufacturing Extension Partnership Program of the Department of Commerce.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3055 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3055 proposed by Senator Stabenow.
